description.narrative: Improving Lake Chad management through building climate change resilience and reducing ecosystem stress through implementation of the Strategic Action Programme for the Lake Chad basin

Outcome 1 : A strengthened LCBC capable of: (i) Developing and implementing policies, investments and improved integrated ecosystem-based lake management through enhance basin-wide monitoring; and (ii): Developing and managing regional projects in accordance with the basin’s priorities expressed in the Lake Indicator 1 : Council of Ministers approve SAP update Indicator 2 : Council of Ministers adopt BD protocol Indicator 3 : DRR protocol accepted by Council of Minister Indicator 4 : Donor Advisory Committee meetings a.Number of donor advisory committee meetings annually Indicator 5 : Donor mapping Indicator 6 : LCBC provides reports on donors, projects co-ordination and SAP/Water Charter implementation progress to Council of Ministers a. Existence and functionality of a monitoring and evaluation system for the SAP b. Existence and functionality of a monitoring and evaluation system for the water charter c. Regular provision of statutory implementation reports to the Council of Ministers Indicator 7 : LCBC staff trained in project management and reporting a. Number of training sessions in project management and reporting b. Number of LCBC staff trained in project management and reporting taking into account gender equality Indicator 8 : National staff trained in project management and reporting a. Number of training sessions in project management and reporting b. Number of National staff trained in project management and reporting taking into account gender equality
Outcome 2 : Strengthened and harmonised approaches to implementing sustainable legal and policy instruments across the Lake Chad Basin countries leading to greater water availability through effective conjunctive use management of surface and groundwater Indicator 1 : Number of countries with harmonized policies with respect to water management a. Existence of an orientation framework for the harmonization b. Number of countries with harmonized water management policies Indicator 2 : Number
